content.rendered:
Neyire is a musician and actor living down the road from me, on the borders of Dalston. I recently met Neyire for the first time, but strangely felt I already knew her a little bit, having seen her wonderful one-woman show Stolen Voices at the Arcola Theatre a couple of years ago.

I’m off to Australia for a few weeks now. Don’t know if I’ll have access to a scanner, but (possibly insanely) I’m taking this chunky old camera. I may post further portraits or other stuff during the next month. Then again, I may not.
